title: The reincarnation office
description: Jumping from one galaxy to the next, the aerialist discovers the intricate relativeness of infinite realities and learns to rely on his imagination for a melodious stride. In this sixth episode, a semi-existent toad floating in mid-life is an attraction the Acoustic Funambulist's innate curiosity just cannot resist. Already available: - The hair of the comet - Five minutes to Doomsday - Perpetual emotion - The Uneventful Galaxy - The pragmatic hitchhiker - Messy Christmas
author: Jean-Yves Crozier
